title: Microsoft Released Windows 11. But Should You Upgrade?
sub_head: The newest Windows operating system got a nice makeover, but weâ€™re still waiting for Android-app compatibility and other game-changing features. Plus, your PC might not even be eligible for the update.
body:
There are two types of Microsoft Windows upgraders:
#1: The Go-Getter. Excited to see what Santa Satya and his merry elves have brought, you smash that update button faster than a Whac-A-Mole champ.
